Class Token

java.lang.Object
  org.dotplot.tokenizer.Token
Direct Known Subclasses:
EOFToken, EOLToken, EOSToken, KeyWordToken
public class Token
extends java.lang.Object

Representation type of a Token.

Version:
1.0 1.5.04
Author:
Christian Gerhardt

TYPE_EOS

public static final int TYPE_EOS
Standard token type for end of stream. This Token returns, when the end of the tokenstream is reached.

equals

public boolean equals(java.lang.Object object)
Proves if two objects are equal.

It returns only a positiv resulst, if the objects are Token. Two Token are equal, if the type and value are equal.

Overrides:
equals in class java.lang.Object
Parameters:
